name: Freddi Fish Maze Madness
description:
Freddi Fish and Luther’s Maze Madness

Over 50 a-maze-ing caverns to explore. Freddi and Luther must find the kelp seeds lost within. This Junior Arcade title is filled with everything you need and is proven to offer hours of entertainment for both children and adults. If the game proves too difficult then simply switch to the Junior Helper setting for a little assistance.

FEATURES:
• Challenging, arcade-style game great for kids ages 3 to 8 (and of all ages) and Over 50 Levels to explore.
• Action with all the quality you would expect from Humongous Entertainment.
• Many power ups to help you on your way.
• Easy-to-use Custom Level Builder.
• Place your name on the leaderboard
